queries.title: Failures on node MININT
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating failures on node MININT.

queries.title: Added attempt to list of failed maps
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating an attempt was added to the list of failed maps.

message.query: Added attempt to list of failed maps

queries.title: TaskAttempt Transitioned from FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP to FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a TaskAttempt transitioned from FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP to FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP.

message.query: TaskAttempt Transitioned from FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP to FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP

queries.title: TaskAttempt Transitioned from FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP to FAILED
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a TaskAttempt transitioned from FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP to FAILED.

message.query: TaskAttempt Transitioned from FAIL_TASK_CLEANUP to FAILED

queries.title: TaskAttempt Transitioned from RUNNING to FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a TaskAttempt transitioned from RUNNING to FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP.

message.query: TaskAttempt Transitioned from RUNNING to FAIL_CONTAINER_CLEANUP

queries.title: DataStreamer Exception
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a DataStreamer Exception.

queries.title: DFSOutputStream ResponseProcessor exception for block
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a DFSOutputStream ResponseProcessor exception for a block.

queries.title: Diagnostics report from attempt: No Route to Host
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a diagnostics report from an attempt with a No Route to Host error.

message.query: Diagnostics report from attempt Error java.net.NoRouteToHostException No Route to Host

queries.title: ERROR IN CONTACTING RM
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating an error in contacting the Resource Manager (RM).

queries.title: Error Recovery for block in pipeline: bad datanode
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating an error recovery for a block in the pipeline due to a bad datanode.

message.query: Error Recovery for block in pipeline bad datanode

queries.title: Error writing History Event
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating an error writing a History Event.

queries.title: Failed to renew lease for DFSClient_NONMAPREDUCE
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a failure to renew a lease for DFSClient_NONMAPREDUCE.

message.query: Failed to renew lease for DFSClient_NONMAPREDUCE

queries.title: KILLING attempt
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating an attempt is being killed.

queries.title: Task cleanup failed for attempt
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a task cleanup failed for an attempt.

queries.title: Task attempt exited: No Route to Host
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a task attempt exited due to a No Route to Host error.

message.query: Task attempt exited java.net.NoRouteToHostException No Route to Host

queries.title: Thread threw an Exception
queries.description: Finds log messages indicating a thread threw an exception.
